title: Influence of interest groups on Congress

content.question: Directions: Suggested time - 25 minutes. Respond to all parts of the question. It is suggested that you take a few minutes to plan and outline each answer. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.Several characteristics of an interest group can enhance its influence over Congress. Because of the perception that interest groups exert undue influence, Congress has regulated the influence of these groups. Describe how each of these characteristics of an interest group can enhance its influence over Congress. Financial resources Expertise Size Identify two ways in which Congress has regulated the influence of interest groups

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
